[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Departments by company ","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{} ,"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":24,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"ShowTitle":false,"ShowSubTitle":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false} ,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Integration Errors","metricFieldValue":"Integration Errors"} ]} ,"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true} ,"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  a.Oid,
		a.[Name],
		c.[Name] as Company,
		a.Active,
		a.InternalService,
		a.DepartmentRequired,
		a.UnitHour as UnitHour,
		a.DefaultMargin,
		a.ExternalId,
		a.VatDeductiblePercentage as VatDeductiblePercentage,
		ag.[Name] as ArticleGroup
from Article a
Inner Join Company c on a.Company=c.Oid
Left Outer Join ArticleGroup ag on (ag.Oid=a.ArticleGroup)"} } ,"Filters":{} ,"QueryConfiguration":{} } ]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"onRowClick":"function(e){if(e.rowType=='data') SkillsWorkflow.genericPreview(e.key.Oid, 'Name', 'article',500,700);} ","selection":{"mode":"multiple"} ,"stateStoring":{"enabled":false} ,"columns":[{"dataField":"Oid","visible":false} ,{"dataField":"Name"} ,{"dataField":"Company"} ,{"dataField":"ExternalId"} ,{"dataField":"ArticleGroup"} ,{"dataField":"VatDeductiblePercentage"} ,{"dataField":"DefaultMargin"} ,{"dataField":"Active"} ,{"dataField":"UnitHour"} ,{"dataField":"InternalService"} ,{"dataField":"DepartmentRequired"} ],"onToolbarPreparing":"function(e) {         var dataGrid = e.component;          e.toolbarOptions.items.unshift({             location: 'after',             template: 'toggleHeaderFilterButtonTemplate'    } );        e.toolbarOptions.items.unshift({             location: 'after',             widget: 'dxButton',             options: { icon: 'plus', onClick: function() {                SkillsWorkflow.genericNew('article',                550,                750);            }         }     } );     var dataGrid = e.component;                e.toolbarOptions.items.unshift({             location: 'after',             widget: 'dxButton',             options: { icon: 'fal fa-times', onClick: function() {                SW.genericDelete('article', dataGrid);            }         }     } );} ","entity":"article"}
